short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse your IP Camera Pictures from Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CamaC is a remote viewing and storage solution for your IP cameras. CamaC sounds an alert for new pictures and provides easy access to historical events. 

Now supports multiple cameras and mobile devices.

Requirements:
A camera capable of FTP file transfer
An account from https://app.comsci.co.uk/camac (currently free during testing)

Advantages:
    Your data is safe and secure. (Encrypted via HTTPS and FTPS)
    Access from anywhere with Internet and a browser.
    No router configuration required.
    No static IP or dynamic proxy requirements.
    No vulnerabilities from open network ports
    No software or plugins to install
    No DVR video recorder required.
    Data is preserved in the event of camera theft, damage or power disconnection
